description:
Definition of all tree-sitter grammars we know of.

Used by both the update script and the default.nix to construct the list of grammars.

Grammar list: https://github.com/tree-sitter/tree-sitter/blob/master/docs/index.md

ignoredTreeSitterOrgRepos.description:
Repositories in the tree-sitter github org that we want to ignore.
These do not contain grammars.

We want to have a full overview of the tree-sitter organization, so that we can notice when a new grammar is added.

repo.description: Repository in the tree-sitter github organization which should be ignored.

reason.description: Reason why this repository is ignored.

knownTreeSitterOrgGrammarRepos.description: Grammars we want to fetch from the tree-sitter github orga

repo.description: Repository name in the tree-sitter github organizaiton, containing a grammar. If there is no `grammars` field, this name will also be used as the name of the grammar & the nix attribute.

otherGrammars.description:
Additional grammars that are not in the official github orga.
If you need a grammar that already exists in the official orga, make sure to give it a different name.

allOf.description: A grammar that does not live in the official tree-sitter github orga.

type.description: The type of repo to fetch.
